Privacy Notice and Consent

Last updated: 2024-03-12

Welcome to Docter!

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Notice explains how Docter ("we", "us", "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information in connection with your use of our website docter.io and the services we provide that allow you to create and manage documents.

Collection of Information

We collect information about you in various ways when you use our site. This includes:

  • Personal Information: We collect personal information you provide to us. For example, we collect your name, email address, and other contact information when you register, create a document, or communicate with us.
  • Usage Data: We collect data about how you and your device interact with our website, including IP addresses, browser type, language, operating system, the pages you visit, and the links you click on.
  • Document Data: We store the documents you create using our services. However, we do not access or use these documents for any purpose other than providing our services to you, unless explicitly authorized by you.

Use of Information

We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to:

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our services.
  • Understand and analyze how you use our services and develop new products, services, features, and functionality.
  • Communicate with you, including to respond to your inquiries and provide customer service.
  • Send you updates and other communications related to our services.
  • Ensure the security of our services and prevent fraud.

Sharing of Information

We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this Privacy Notice:

  • With service providers who perform services on our behalf.
  • In response to a request for information if we believe disclosure is in accordance with, or required by, any applicable law, regulation, or legal process.
  • With your consent or at your direction.

Your Rights and Choices

Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the rights to access, correct, delete, or port your personal information and the right to object to or limit certain processing of your personal information.

Consent

By using our services, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as outlined in this Privacy Notice.

Changes to This Privacy Notice

We may modify this Privacy Notice from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the notice and, in some cases, we may provide you with additional notice (such as adding a statement to our homepage or sending you an email notification).

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Notice, please contact us at support@docter.io.
